name: salary-ranges
description: Google Apps Script for Salary Range Calculator with Aon market data integration

scripts.deploy: npm run push && git add . && git commit -m 'Deploy: Apps Script update' && git push
scripts.git:push: git add . && git commit -m 'Auto-update' && git push
scripts.quick-push: clasp push && git add . && git commit -m 'Quick update' && git push
